channel.title: Xiejra - False Face [IDM/ Experimental]
channel.description:
Hey guys! Back again with yet another release off my album. Some of yoy may know the release date of my album (24th of August) and as of this time I have moved into ableton!
This is quite a strange track really testing the limits here.
Anyway hope you enjoy, feedback is appreciated! üòÅ
Listen here: Next track off the album https://soundcloud.com/xiejramusic/false-face
~X

item.title: Xiejra - False Face [IDM/ Experimental]
item.dc:creator: Xiejra
item.description:
Thanks man. The idea of this one was to start it out like a calm ish kinda upbeat track and then completely flip it into this chaotic kinda mess.

Yeah already started just sound desiging and building a sample library really in live It‚Äôs definitely a lot more fun

item.title: Xiejra - False Face [IDM/ Experimental]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Pretty slick right before the first set of growly bass just the strings and piano are really nice. This is definitely all over the place but not in a bad way, you‚Äôve got it working for you. Mix is good, everything sits very nicely I think. Great job!

Looking forward to what you churn out in Live it‚Äôs always fun to hear what happens to someone‚Äôs style when they pick up a new tool.
